headline: 3 Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy With $1,000 Right Now
summary: Former Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE:BRK-B) CEO Warren Buffett recently handed his chief executive position over to Greg Abel. Nonetheless, Buffett’s stature as a world-class value investor remains intact and Berkshire’s portfolio is populated with Buffett-inspired stock picks. Even if you aren’t a billionaire like Buffett, you can participate in some of the Oracle of Omaha’s premium stock ... 3 Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy With $1,000 Right Now

headline: Is Credo (CRDO) One of the Must-Buy AI Stocks to Invest In?
summary: Credo Technology Group Holding Ltd (NASDAQ:CRDO) is one of the must-buy AI stocks to invest in. On December 16, BofA cut its price target on Credo Technology Group Holding Ltd (NASDAQ:CRDO) to $200 per share from $240. The investment bank kept a Buy rating on the stock. According to BofA, 2026 is the halfway point […]

headline: BofA names top stocks as 2026 Tax Refunds set to see strong growth
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America expects the 2026 tax refund season to deliver a major boost to several SMID-cap e-commerce names, with analysts naming two key names it expects to benefit. The bank is projecting the strongest refund growth in years.

headline: How Investors May Respond To Bank of America (BAC) Accounting Shift And Fixed-Income, Digital Asset Push
summary: In early January 2026, Bank of America announced several new fixed-income offerings, adjusted its accounting for affordable housing and renewable energy investments, and faced regulatory scrutiny in India over a 2024 block trade while preparing to report fourth quarter 2025 results. These developments, combined with the bank’s increased emphasis on digital assets for wealth clients and its role in wildfire-related mortgage relief, highlight how Bank of America is reshaping its balance sheet,...
